ommc.config.generic.openConfigGui.name: openConfigGui
ommc.config.generic.openConfigGui.commen: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI
ommc.config.generic.debug.name: debug
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disableBreakS: Player can only break the scaffolding with the items in §6breakScaffoldingWhiteList§r
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disableMoveDo: Player can only move down in scaffolding when the item of §6moveDownInScaffoldingWhiteList§r in hand
ommc.config.feature_toggle.forceBreaking: Player will have 5 gt cooldown after instant breaking.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.preventExplod: prevent player use bed in nether or the end
ommc.config.feature_toggle.worldEaterMin: When ores and obsidian are exposed to the air, game will render their own mirror image above them, which is convenient for world eater maintenance and mining
ommc.config.lists.breakScaffoldingWhiteL: If enable §6disableBreakScaffolding§r, player can only break the scaffolding with the items in §6breakScaffoldingWhiteList§r
ommc.config.lists.moveDownInScaffoldingW: If enable §6disableMoveDownInScaffolding§r, player can only move down in scaffolding when the item of §6moveDownInScaffoldingWhiteList§r in hand
